levels.description: Lv. I: Allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Iron Ore> into <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed).
Lv. II: Additionally allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Stone> into <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed)
Lv. III: Additionally allows you to combine <Fresh Water> and <Wood> into <Crude Gold> (up to 1 construct of the same type can be deployed)
